data.title: Check [ Lodha Crown Dombivli Address ] of 1 bhk & 2 bhk
data.meta_description: [ Lodha Crown Dombivali Manpada ] Offers 1 bhk & 2 bhk Apartments with best connectivity. View [ Lodha Crown Dombivli Address ] Here. Call 9920 4646 74
data.meta_site_name: Heer Properties - Best Properties in Mumbai
data.text:
Lodha Crown Dombivali East is Strategically Located in Close Proximity to All the Conveniences and Facilities That You and Your Family Will Ever Need. Everything Here, From Recreational Amenities to Infrastructure Development Which Connects to the Rest of the City Are a Pleasant 5-10 Minute Stroll Away, Ensuring You Are Living at a Lodha Crown Dombivli a Location that’s A Cut above the Rest.

Lodha Crown Dombivali to Dombivali Station Distance is 5.5 KM.

Established in 1980, privately held Lodha Group is India’s No 1 real estate developer and amongst the world’s select multinational real estate developers with presence in India and the United Kingdom.

The Group is currently developing an estimated 43 million sq ft of prime real estate with the largest land reserves in MMR, and has 28 ongoing projects across London, Mumbai, Pune and Hyderabad and expanding in Bangalore. The group has the largest land bank of over 6,200 acres with an estimated saleable area of ~553 million sq ft.
